com.nflabs.grok

Class GrokException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.nflabs.grok.GrokException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GrokException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Signals that an Grok exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted Grok operations.
    Since:
    0.0.4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
